patthana1.13:101.1: Appamāṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca paritto dhammo uppajjati navipākapaccayā—
patthana1.13:101.2: kusale appamāṇe khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. #2
patthana1.13:102.1: Appamāṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca paritto ca appamāṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti navipākapaccayā—
patthana1.13:102.2: kusalaṃ appamāṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #3
patthana1.13:103.1: Parittañca appamāṇañca dhammaṃ paṭicca paritto dhammo uppajjati navipākapaccayā—
patthana1.13:103.2: kusale appamāṇe khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. #1
patthana1.13:104.1: Parittañca mahaggatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca paritto dhammo uppajjati navipākapaccayā—
patthana1.13:104.2: mahaggate khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. #1
patthana1.13:106.1: Parittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca paritto dhammo uppajjati naāhārapaccayā—
patthana1.13:106.25: arūpe parittaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana1.13:107.1: Mahaggataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca mahaggato dhammo uppajjati navippayuttapaccayā—
patthana1.13:108.1: Appamāṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca appamāṇo dhammo uppajjati navippayuttapaccayā—
patthana1.13:111.1: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā dasa, naanantare pañca, nasamanantare pañca, naaññamaññe naupanissaye pañca, napurejāte dvādasa, napacchājāte terasa, naāsevane terasa, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye najhāne namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā pañca, novigate pañca.
patthana1.13:114.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā dasa, naanantare pañca, nasamanantare naaññamaññe naupanissaye pañca, napurejāte dvādasa, napacchājāte terasa, naāsevane terasa, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā pañca, novigate pañca.
patthana1.13:117.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe ekaṃ, anantare ekaṃ … pe … vigate ekaṃ, avigate ekaṃ.
patthana1.13:125.1: Parittaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā paritto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.13:125.2: parittaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana1.13:125.8: khandhe paccayā vatthu, vatthuṃ paccayā khandhā;
patthana1.13:126.1: Parittaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā mahaggato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.13:127.1: Parittaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā appamāṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.13:128.1: Parittaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā paritto ca appamāṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana1.13:128.2: vatthuṃ paccayā appamāṇā khandhā, mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. #4
patthana1.13:129.1: Parittaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā paritto ca mahaggato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana1.13:129.2: vatthuṃ paccayā mahaggatā khandhā, mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ.
patthana1.13:130.1: Mahaggataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā mahaggato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.13:130.2: mahaggataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā … pe …
patthana1.13:131.1: Mahaggataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā paritto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.13:132.1: Mahaggataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā paritto ca mahaggato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana1.13:132.2: mahaggataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana1.13:133.1: Appamāṇaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā appamāṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—

patthana1.13:135.2: appamāṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā … pe …. #2

patthana1.13:136.2: appamāṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana1.13:136.6: appamāṇe khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. #3
patthana1.13:137.1: Parittañca mahaggatañca dhammaṃ paccayā paritto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana1.13:139.1: Parittaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā paritto dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana1.13:139.2: parittaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana1.13:139.8: vatthuṃ paccayā khandhā, cakkhāyatanaṃ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ … pe … kāyāyatanaṃ paccayā kāyaviññāṇaṃ, vatthuṃ paccayā parittā khandhā (avasesā cha pañhā hetupaccayasadisā satta kātabbā), adhipatipaccayā (paṭisandhi natthi, sattarasa pañhā paripuṇṇā), anantarapaccayā … pe …
patthana1.13:142.1: Hetuyā sattarasa, ārammaṇe satta, adhipatiyā sattarasa, anantare satta, samanantare satta, sahajāte sattarasa, aññamaññe nava, nissaye sattarasa, upanissaye satta, purejāte satta, āsevane satta, kamme sattarasa, vipāke sattarasa, āhāre sattarasa, indriye jhāne magge sattarasa, sampayutte satta, vippayutte sattarasa, atthiyā sattarasa, natthiyā satta, vigate satta, avigate sattarasa (evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ)
patthana1.13:146.1: Parittaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā paritto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana1.13:146.2: ahetukaṃ parittaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana1.13:146.8: khandhe paccayā vatthu, vatthuṃ paccayā khandhā;
patthana1.13:146.15: kāyāyatanaṃ paccayā kāyaviññāṇaṃ, vatthuṃ paccayā ahetukā parittā khandhā, vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. #1
patthana1.13:148.1: Parittaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā paritto dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā.

patthana1.13:150.2: parittaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana1.13:151.1: Parittaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā mahaggato dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana1.13:151.2: vatthuṃ paccayā mahaggatādhipati, vatthuṃ paccayā vipākā mahaggatā khandhā.
patthana1.13:152.1: Parittaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā appamāṇo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana1.13:153.1: Parittaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā paritto ca mahaggato ca dhammā uppajjanti naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana1.13:153.2: vatthuṃ paccayā vipākā mahaggatā khandhā, mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ.
patthana1.13:154.1: Mahaggataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā mahaggato dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana1.13:154.2: mahaggate khandhe paccayā mahaggatādhipati, vipākaṃ mahaggataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana1.13:155.1: Mahaggataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā paritto dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana1.13:155.2: vipāke mahaggate khandhe paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ.
patthana1.13:156.1: Mahaggataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā paritto ca mahaggato ca dhammā uppajjanti naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana1.13:156.2: vipākaṃ mahaggataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana1.13:157.1: Appamāṇaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā appamāṇo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana1.13:158.1: Parittañca appamāṇañca dhammaṃ paccayā appamāṇo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana1.13:158.2: appamāṇe khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā appamāṇādhipati. #1

patthana1.13:161.1: Parittañca mahaggatañca dhammaṃ paccayā paritto ca mahaggato ca dhammā uppajjanti naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana1.13:161.2: vipākaṃ mahaggataṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana1.13:161.6: vipāke mahaggate khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ.
patthana1.13:161.7: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe vipākaṃ mahaggataṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana1.13:161.11: vipāke mahaggate khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā kaṭattārūpaṃ. #3

patthana1.13:166.1: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā dvādasa, naanantare pañca, nasamanantare naaññamaññe naupanissaye pañca, napurejāte dvādasa, napacchājāte sattarasa, naāsevane sattarasa, nakamme satta, navipāke sattarasa, naāhāre naindriye najhāne namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā pañca, novigate pañca.
patthana1.13:169.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā dvādasa, naanantare pañca, nasamanantare pañca, naaññamaññe pañca, naupanissaye pañca, napurejāte dvādasa, napacchājāte sattarasa, naāsevane sattarasa, nakamme satta, navipāke sattarasa, nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā pañca, novigate pañca.

patthana1.13:182.2: appamāṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #1

patthana1.13:187.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.

patthana1.13:218.1: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naadhipatiyā tīṇi, napurejāte tīṇi, napacchājāte tīṇi, naāsevane tīṇi, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke tīṇi, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, navippayutte tīṇi.
patthana1.13:221.1: Hetupaccayā naadhipatiyā tīṇi, napurejāte napacchājāte naāsevane nakamme navipāke navippayutte tīṇi.
patthana1.13:224.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe ekaṃ, anantare ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana1.13:232.1: Paritto dhammo parittassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.13:232.2: parittā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.13:233.1: Mahaggato dhammo mahaggatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana1.13:234.1: Appamāṇo dhammo appamāṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana1.13:236.1: Paritto dhammo parittassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.13:236.2: dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati, ariyā gotrabhuṃ paccavekkhanti, vodānaṃ paccavekkhanti, pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti.
patthana1.13:236.8: vipassanti assādenti abhinandanti, taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati.
patthana1.13:237.1: Paritto dhammo mahaggatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.13:237.2: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti, cetopariyañāṇena parittacittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānāti.
patthana1.13:237.3: Parittā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa yathākammūpagañāṇassa anāgataṃsañāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #2
